page.title: 11ST.PETER'S CHURCH RUDDINGTON
page.content: {Heather Bartlett}belongs to the church choir and they practice once a week and sing twice every Sunday and at weddings.They wear long red gowns with shorter white ones over the top and white frills round their necks. On {Ascension Day} the choir go on to the roof of the church very early in the morning and sing hymns. The {Wakes}is held on the nearest weekend to{St. Peter's Day on June {29th.}On the Sunday there is a service which starts on the dodgems at the fair ground. Then a Silver Band leads a parade to the Church where there is a service and all the Denominations in the village take part.
